In a small town in the interior of the U.S., a family seeking quiet lead a perfect life , the best country style. The opportunity arises when a building that decades ago housed a local chain is available for those who bump into paying the amount that the sheriff asks . Even knowing the history of the building and a remote possibility of reactivation of the prison, the price was too good to be refused . When the local jail catches fire and is totally destroyed , there is no other place to put the prisoners , but the old prison. The family who lives there now has as guests the sheriff's men and also arrested . The stress of the situation on Seth opens a door should not be opened and releases a deadly hatred , which echoed for years by the old prison cells . This feeling contagious puts everyone in danger when Seth loses control and protect their families thinking , just making room for a malignant entity taking charge of the situation and initiate a sequence of unlimited violence
